alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Ellis (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 24 at 7:05PM CDT until September 24 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Ellis County in north central Texas... Southwestern Dallas County in north central Texas... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 705 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ovilla, or near Glenn Heights, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Grand Prairie, Desoto, Cedar Hill, Duncanville, Lancaster, Waxahachie, Ennis, Midlothian, Glenn Heights, Red Oak, Ovilla, Palmer, Oak Leaf, Bardwell, Alma, Bardwell Lake, Garrett, Pecan Hill, Avalon, and Rockett. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35E between mile markers 393 and 416. Interstate 20 between mile markers 463 and 465. Interstate 45 between mile markers 244 and 262. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
